thread.title: Great hotel, Fantastic location, Wonderful staff!
thread.title_full: Great hotel, Fantastic location, Wonderful staff! - Review of 6 Columbus - A SIXTY Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: marthalena
title: Great hotel, Fantastic location, Wonderful staff!
text:
Perfectly located right on Columbus Circle and Central Park, with Time Warner Center and everything midtown has to offer just outside your room. I love this place! I called to see if I could get a better deal by booking directly with the hotel instead of one of the deals I saw online. So glad I did! They offered me an even better deal, and I ended up getting upgraded on top of that! My hotel room was the biggest, swankiest I've ever had in NYC. The service was excellent. The in-house sushi restaurant was a neighborhood hotspot. The bathroom was amazing and the products were good. When can I go back?
Room Tip: Ask for a higher room and you may get a great view of Columbus Circle See more room tips
